import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './style/Sidebar.css'; import Logout from './Logout'; const Nav = () => { const [unpurchasedCount, setUnpurchasedCount] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { // Fetch the unpurchased count from your API or context and update the state // For demonstration purposes, I'll set it to 3 initially setUnpurchasedCount(3); }, []); // Adjust the dependencies based on your application logic return (
  • Main Page
  • Upcoming Events
  • Past Events
  • Reviews {/* This section will have subsections with reviews and an option to add a review for an event, only for those events for which a ticket has been purchased */}
  • Cart {unpurchasedCount > 0 && {unpurchasedCount}} {/* This page will have another section with the order history showing orders by date */}
  • {/* Only visible to admins */} Create New Event
  • About Us
); }; export default Nav;
